endpoints.description: Retrieve the current stock levels for all pharmaceutical items in the inventory.
Retrieve the stock level status for a specific pharmaceutical item identified by its unique ID.
Submit updates to the stock levels, reflecting received or dispensed inventory.
Retrieve a list of pharmaceutical items with their respective expiration dates.
Retrieve items approaching their expiration dates to facilitate prioritized usage.
Retrieve a report detailing inventory levels that require restocking.
Set up notifications for items that fall below a specified stock level.
Remove a previously configured restock notification utilizing its unique identifier.
Retrieve analysis and trends based on historical pharmaceutical consumption data.
Submit user feedback regarding stock management or service functionality.
